verbs.description: [ARG1: piers] [V: morgan] ridicules ‘ blue wave ’ says dems need a better 2020 plan or ‘ trump will drown them’ english journalist piers morgan laid into democrats in an op - ed published wednesday in the daily mail morgan mocked the democrats blue wave and suggested that they better have a bigger and better 2020 plan in place if they want a chance at unseating president donald trump what did he say in the op - ed morgan said that he was n't all that impressed with democrats hoped - for blue wave that would ideally have taken over the various branches of government had the midterm elections gone the way they intended morgan wrote blue wave i 've seen bigger political puddles after two years of relentless and often demented celebrity - fuelled trump - bashing hysteria the democrats sneaked back the house of representatives with a swing of seats far smaller than the shellacking that engulfed incumbent first time presidents bill clinton in 1994 or barack obama in 2010 the two went on to be re - elected morgan noted and compared the resistance to nothing more than a … donald trump piers morgan trump

[ARG0: piers morgan] [V: ridicules] ‘ [ARG1: blue wave] ’ says dems need a better 2020 plan or ‘ trump will drown them’ english journalist piers morgan laid into democrats in an op - ed published wednesday in the daily mail morgan mocked the democrats blue wave and suggested that they better have a bigger and better 2020 plan in place if they want a chance at unseating president donald trump what did he say in the op - ed morgan said that he was n't all that impressed with democrats hoped - for blue wave that would ideally have taken over the various branches of government had the midterm elections gone the way they intended morgan wrote blue wave i 've seen bigger political puddles after two years of relentless and often demented celebrity - fuelled trump - bashing hysteria the democrats sneaked back the house of representatives with a swing of seats far smaller than the shellacking that engulfed incumbent first time presidents bill clinton in 1994 or barack obama in 2010 the two went on to be re - elected morgan noted and compared the resistance to nothing more than a … donald trump piers morgan trump

[ARG0: piers morgan] ridicules ‘ blue wave ’ [V: says] [ARG1: dems need a better 2020 plan or ‘ trump will drown them’ english journalist piers morgan laid into democrats] in an op - ed published wednesday in the daily mail morgan mocked the democrats blue wave and suggested that they better have a bigger and better 2020 plan in place if they want a chance at unseating president donald trump what did he say in the op - ed morgan said that he was n't all that impressed with democrats hoped - for blue wave that would ideally have taken over the various branches of government had the midterm elections gone the way they intended morgan wrote blue wave i 've seen bigger political puddles after two years of relentless and often demented celebrity - fuelled trump - bashing hysteria the democrats sneaked back the house of representatives with a swing of seats far smaller than the shellacking that engulfed incumbent first time presidents bill clinton in 1994 or barack obama in 2010 the two went on to be re - elected morgan noted and compared the resistance to nothing more than a … donald trump piers morgan trump

piers morgan ridicules ‘ blue wave ’ says [ARG0: dems] [V: need] [ARG1: a better 2020 plan] or ‘ trump will drown them’ english journalist piers morgan laid into democrats in an op - ed published wednesday in the daily mail morgan mocked the democrats blue wave and suggested that they better have a bigger and better 2020 plan in place if they want a chance at unseating president donald trump what did he say in the op - ed morgan said that he was n't all that impressed with democrats hoped - for blue wave that would ideally have taken over the various branches of government had the midterm elections gone the way they intended morgan wrote blue wave i 've seen bigger political puddles after two years of relentless and often demented celebrity - fuelled trump - bashing hysteria the democrats sneaked back the house of representatives with a swing of seats far smaller than the shellacking that engulfed incumbent first time presidents bill clinton in 1994 or barack obama in 2010 the two went on to be re - elected morgan noted and compared the resistance to nothing more than a … donald trump piers morgan trump
